summary: This batch represents work across multiple product teams focusing on OTP (One-Time Purchase) checkout implementation, test infrastructure improvements, and pet food funnel enhancements. Major efforts include GTM event tracking standardization, localStorage cleanup, quarantine system for flaky tests, and portion percentage customization features for pet food plans.

decisions.what: Remove cadence value from One-time purchase option
decisions.rationale: Change in requirements - one-time purchases should not have cadence set in localStorage

decisions.what: Display portion % options based on FeedingPlanType answer rather than statsig allocation
decisions.rationale: Checking statsig variation triggers unwanted allocation events; checking answer existence is more appropriate

decisions.what: Cart drawer should display subTotal (without tax) instead of grandTotal
decisions.rationale: Pre-checkout does not have post-code to determine tax amount
This was already completed in previous work

decisions.what: Won't add tracing to useCreateOTPOrderForCheckout hook separately
decisions.rationale: Traces were already added as part of GOC-3360

initiatives.name: OTP (One-Time Purchase) Checkout Implementation
initiatives.description: Complete implementation of one-time purchase flow including checkout, payment, tracking, analytics, and cleanup logic to enable non-subscription purchases

initiatives.name: Pet Food Portion Percentage Customization
initiatives.description: Enable users to select custom portion percentages (75% Fresh, 50% Dry, 75% Dry) for pet food plans with proper defaults and calorie adjustments

initiatives.name: Test Infrastructure - Quarantine System
initiatives.description: Implement quarantine system to prevent flaky tests from blocking CI/CD pipeline

initiatives.name: VMS OTP GTM Event Tracking
initiatives.description: Add comprehensive GTM event tracking for VMS OTP flow to enable product metrics and analytics

initiatives.name: Multi-Cadence Flow GTM Updates
initiatives.description: Update and enhance GTM events for multi-cadence subscription flow with proper event labels

initiatives.name: RTE Active Voucher Management for Peak
initiatives.description: Create voucher filtering and management for RTE active customers during peak season to prevent leakage to new customers

blockers.description: Bug blocking QA validation of portion % default selection
blockers.impact: Ticket remains in QA column until bug is resolved

blockers.description: iAdvize chatbot causing infinite loop and website freeze
blockers.impact: Users cannot interact with chatbot; requires coordination with digital-tracking team

technical_patterns.context: Prevents stale values from affecting subsequent user sessions; implemented for shipping/billing address IDs after OTP order creation
Used to control display of new portion % options and adjust calories feature based on experiment allocation

technical_patterns.pattern: Separation of concerns in GTM events using box_type parameter
technical_patterns.context: Enables differentiation between OTP funnel and regular subscription box funnel in analytics
Prevents unreliable tests from blocking CI/CD while maintaining test coverage visibility

technical_patterns.pattern: Avoiding statsig allocation checks for display logic
technical_patterns.context: Checking variation allocation triggers unwanted events; better to check for answer existence

technical_patterns.pattern: Tracing and observability for checkout flows
technical_patterns.context: Comprehensive monitoring of OTP order creation for debugging and performance tracking
Removing unused Shopify redirection logic and PCSv1 dependencies to maintain clean codebase
Display subTotal instead of grandTotal when postal code is not available for tax determination

dependencies.context: Coordination needed to resolve iAdvize infinite loop issue
Consultation on tracking events specification and implementation
QA validation blocked by bug that needs resolution
Feature display logic depends on experiment configuration and answer data
Awaiting specification clarification for event_label and new event requirements
